DOC.brief_title: Measurements Of Zinc Concentration On Specimens Taken During Trans-Perineal Prostate Biopsy
DOC.criteria: Elevated PSA , > 10ng/mL Subject underwent primary least one secondary ( repeat ) prostate biopsy negative diagnosis Subject direct saturated transperineal biopsy Subject Zn supplement nutrition treatment
